programme.title: The First 48: The Detective Speaks - Broken Home (#313) aka Ep.3
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 In New Orleans, a young mother is ambushed at home and shot at close range. Detective Rob Barrere's case depends solely on the eyewitness account of a four-year-old girl and leads to another brutal death.

programme.title: The First 48: The Detective Speaks - Murder in Treme (#286)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 In New Orleans, when a woman is slashed to death, the investigation into her murder leads Detectives Chuck Ward and Rob Barrere to a house of horrors, and they discover the killer may be someone they least expected.

programme.title: The First 48: The Detective Speaks - Lester Street (#112)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 In Memphis, Lt. Toney Armstrong and his team respond to Memphis's worst mass murder in more than 15 years. Armstrong's entire team is called to action as they scramble for leads.

programme.title: The First 48: The Detective Speaks - Blood Lust (#303) aka Ep.1
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 The city of Atlanta is gripped with fear as a deadly killer prowls the streets for unsuspecting victims. Detective David Quinn must track him down before he strikes again.

programme.title: The First 48: The Detective Speaks - Ringside Seat (#289)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 Tulsa homicide delves into a dark world of drugs and prostitution to solve the murder of a man executed in his car in a motel parking lot.

programme.title: The First 48: The Detective Speaks - Night Run (#298)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 When a young father is ambushed by a pack of brazen shooters, Atlanta Detective Summer Benton uncovers the shocking reason for his murder.

programme.title: The First 48 - Mr. New Orleans/ No Shelter
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 4 New Orleans Homicide works the stabbing death of an infamous local criminal. In Minneapolis, a squabble amongst friends leaves a woman brutally murdered in a bus station.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bad Romance/ Out of Control
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 5 In Minneapolis, when a young Somali girl is executed in bed, Sergeants Charlie Adams and Chris Thomsen uncover a secret relationship that may have turned deadly.

programme.title: The First 48 - A Fighting Chance
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 7 When an argument at a local bar ends with a young social activist shot sixteen times, Tulsa Detective Ronnie Leatherman searches for answers in a divided community.

programme.title: The First 48 - The Other Wife
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 10 When a father is gunned down protecting his wife in Kansas City, Detectives hope his ex-wife knows who wanted him dead.

programme.title: The First 48 - Love Hate/ A Soldier's Life
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 11 In Tulsa, a young woman goes on the run when her boyfriend is murdered. In Atlanta, an army veteran is gunned down after helping a homeless man.

programme.title: The First 48 - A Man's Game
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 12 In Atlanta, when a young man is shot and left to die in the bushes, a mysterious white Town Car will be the key to Detective Calvin Thomas's investigation.

programme.title: The First 48 - Mr. New Orleans/ No Shelter
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 4 New Orleans Homicide works the stabbing death of an infamous local criminal. In Minneapolis, a squabble amongst friends leaves a woman brutally murdered in a bus station.

programme.title: The First 48 - Bad Romance/ Out of Control
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 5 In Minneapolis, when a young Somali girl is executed in bed, Sergeants Charlie Adams and Chris Thomsen uncover a secret relationship that may have turned deadly.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Too Close to Home
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 Detective Rod Demery is called to the scene of a deadly roadside shootout.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - The Man Behind the Mosque
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 A community is left shaken when a dead body is found near a local mosque.

programme.title: Murder Chose Me - Hollywood Boys
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 Two law-abiding teens are murdered in a brazen and cowardly attack.

programme.title: The First 48 - Brothers Down
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 13 In Tulsa, two brothers are shot down after checking on their night cleaning crew. Detectives struggle to find a motive before the killer strikes again.

programme.title: The First 48 - Carnage in the Streets
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 14 In Mobile, two young men are gunned down within the space of 12 hours, and clues point to a feud between rival cliques.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Fifteen
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 Fifteen-year-old Juanita Payne was killed outside a party by a stray round from an AK-47. Detectives arrest a man they are sure is the killer. But the case begins to fall apart soon after. Will the alleged killer walk free?

programme.title: After the First 48 - Torched/Girl Fight
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 In Miami, Detective Freddie Ponce arrests a man who tortured and killed his childhood friend. The case is strong--until an unexpected event in the first days of trial puts the whole thing in jeopardy.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Tag Team/Heart of Gold
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 In Memphis, TN, Lt. Caroline Mason revisits the 2007 homicide of a 19-year-old man shot to death during a street fight that got out of hand.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Last Call/Road Hazard
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 A brutal shooting in Memphis leaves a single mom mourning her only son. The main suspect is a high-ranking gang member. Will his violent reputation keep witnesses from testifying?

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Unravelling the Murder of Janet Commins
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 119 The case of a brutal murder, a terrible injustice, and how a new, dedicated police team and DNA profiling eventually caught up with the killer, 40 years after the crime was committed.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Body in the Canal
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 120 The story of a barbaric murder and how smart police work and a broad forensic investigation not only identified the victim, but ultimately led to the people responsible.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Grangegorman Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 121 This case, involving Ireland’s only living serial killer, was brought to a close after nearly two decades, with the help of advances in forensic science.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Tracing Suzanne Nauman's Murderer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 122 The story of the violent death of a young, woman, how her murder investigation led police to another case, and how the science of DNA profiling played a central role in unravelling the truth.

programme.title: Trace of Evil - The Grim Sleeper
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 123 The story of a manhunt, which lasted nearly three decades. How the killer identified and then murdered his victims…. And how the revolutionary science of DNA eventually led to his capture.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Is There In Truth No Beauty?
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 Miranda Jones, a telepath who studied mental disciplines on Vulcan, arrives with Ambassador Kolos, a Medusan.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Spectre Of The Gun
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 6 When coming to a xenophobic isolationist planet, Captain Kirk and his landing party are punished for trespassing.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Day Of The Dove
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 7 When the Enterprise brings aboard Klingon prisoners, an alien entity pits both sides against each other in an ever-escalating struggle.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - For The World Is Hollow And I Have Touched The Sky
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 8 At the same time McCoy discovers that he has a year to live, the U.S.S. Enterprise encounters the asteroid Yonada which is determined to be artificially propelled.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Tholian Web
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 9 Kirk is trapped in interphase, while the Enterprise is trapped by a powerful energy web.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Plato's Stepchildren
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 10 After Dr. McCoy helps the leader of a planet populated by people with powerful psionic abilities, they decide to force him to stay by torturing his comrades until he submits.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Wink Of An Eye
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 11 Hyper-accelerated aliens, invisible to the naked eye, take over the Enterprise.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Empath
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 12 On a planet doomed to destruction, Kirk, Spock, and McCoy become involved with two aliens who use them as laboratory animals in a bizarre series of tests on an alien empath who may be the savior of her planet.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Elaan Of Troyius
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 13 The Enterprise must escort an alien princess to her marriage to seal an interplanetary alliance. In their journey, she becomes attracted to Kirk.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Whom Gods Destroy
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 14 Kirk and Spock deliver medicine to an insane asylum where a former Starfleet captain is being held. They discover that he has freed the inmates and is running the place.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - Let That Be Your Last Battlefield
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 15 The Enterprise hosts two alien beings from the same planet who share an intense and self-destructive hatred of each other.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Mark Of Gideon
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 16 Kirk beams down on a diplomatic mission. He finds himself on an Enterprise where all the crew has vanished, and only a mysterious woman resides.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - That Which Survives
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 17 Kirk, McCoy, and Sulu are stranded on a barren planet where a mysterious woman attempts to kill them one at a time, while the Enterprise must travel halfway across the galaxy to rescue them.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Original Series - The Lights Of Zetar
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 18 The Enterprise must deal with incorporeal cloud-like aliens who have already destroyed the inhabitants of a library planet.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Twenty-Two
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 While in the hospital recovering from overwork, Liz Powell keeps dreaming about going down to the hospital morgue.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - The Odyssey of Flight 33
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 Passing through the sound barrier a commercial airliner inadvertently travels back in time.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Mr. Dingle, the Strong
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 A timid vacuum-cleaner salesman is given the strength of 300 men by some experimenting aliens.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone - Static
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 An old radio is taking bitter bachelor Ed Lindsay back to a happier time before what he considers worthless tripe on television when he starts picking up radio programs from the 1930's and 1940's.

programme.title: Solarbabies - Solarbabies
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 This futuristic tale features the top talents of Hollywood's new generation including Jami Gertz, Lukas Haas and Jason Patric as prisoners in a fortress who plan their dazzling escape on wheels.

programme.title: Supernova - Supernova
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 "Supernova" chronicles the search and rescue patrol of a deep space medical ship and its six-member crew.

programme.title: The Last Starship - The Last Starship
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Conflict and tension looms heavily across the broken remains of a distant, post-apocalyptic world.

programme.title: StarCrash - StarCrash
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 An outlaw smuggler and her alien companion are recruited by the Emperor of the Galaxy to rescue his son and destroy a secret weapon by the evil Count Zarth Arn.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Warmonger
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 17 MacLeod promised Immortal Drakov that he wouldn't fight. Today, an old man urges MacLeod to recant his promise.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Pharaoh's Daughter
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 18 MacLeod feels the Buzz coming from an ancient sarcophagus and opens it to find Nefertiri, Cleopatra's handmaid, buried 2000 years ago.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Legacy
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 When her mentor Rebecca is killed, Amanda is determined to avenge her, even though it means going up against the formidable Immortal Luther.

programme.title: Highlander: The Series - Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Richie returns, turning to Duncan for help. An Immortal has been following him, refusing to confront him, but committing murders wherever Richie goes.

programme.title: FAILARMY: 50 VS. 50 - Scares vs. Fears
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 Whether the fear or scare fails harder.

programme.title: FAILARMY: 50 VS. 50 - College vs. Jobs
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Failing doesn't stop when people trade college for the workplace; seeing where the bigger flops are.

programme.title: FAILARMY: 50 VS. 50 - States vs. Nations

programme.title: FAILARMY: 50 VS. 50 - Bad Habits vs Resolutions

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Parallax
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Tensions rise between the merged Starfleet and Maquis crews when the ship becomes trapped inside a star that's collapsed upon itself.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Time And Again
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 When Paris and Janeway are sent back in time, they must decide whether to violate the Prime Directive by warning residents of a planet facing annihilation.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Phage
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 Neelix faces certain death when an alien race stricken by a devastating plague "harvests" his lungs.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Cloud
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 The crew discovers that a nebula is not what it seems, and Paris invites his fellow officers to share a little "R&R" in his holodeck program.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Eye Of The Needle
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 The discovery of a wormhole in deep space raises the crew's hopes of finding a shortcut home.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Ex Post Facto
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 After Paris is convicted of a murder he swears he didn't commit, Tuvok must play detective to clear him.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Emanations
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 Kim confronts life and death issues when he's held against his will by an alien race.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Prime Factors
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 10 An alien leader has the technology that could send the crew 40,000 light years closer to home -- but refuses to share it with them.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - State Of Flux
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 11 The crew realizes there's a traitor on board after Federation technology turns upon an enemy warship.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Heroes And Demons
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 12 Janeway sends the ship's doctor on his first Away Mission: rescue the crew members who have vanished in the holodeck's version of Beowulf.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Cathexis
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 13 An encounter with a strange nebula leaves Chakotay brain-dead and the crew battling a powerful force that seems to be taking over their minds.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Faces
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 Voyager's half-human, half-Klingon Chief Engineer Torres is split into two beings by a scientist desperate to cure the plague that's destroying his people.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Jetrel
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 A painful chapter in Neelix's past is reopened when the man responsible for killing his family beams aboard Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Learning Curve
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 16 Tuvok incurs the wrath of Maquis crewmembers when he's put in charge of a "boot camp" designed to bring them up to Starfleet standards.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 21
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 21 This episode includes: Kicked Out Killer, G.I. Guinea Pig, Foster Baby and Astarte's Last Stand & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack: Episode: 20 - Episode: 20
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 20 This episode includes: Mummy's Curse, Cabbie Bomber, Terrorized Teen and Amtrak Sabotage.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 8
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 8 This episode includes: Falcon Lake UFO, Inside Frontera, UD: Loving's Lost Love and Disappearing Dad.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 11
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 11 This episode includes: Polio & UD, Missing Gringo, UD: Lucky Lost Love, Poison Shake & UD and UD: Goldie's Girl.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 5
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 5 This episode includes: Dear Patricia & UD, Lucie's Last Fare & UD, Unknown Mom & UD and Little Miss Panasoffkee & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 16
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 16 This episode includes: Gasparetto, Tara! Tara! Tara!, Fritz and the Soldiers & UD, UD: Log Cabin Fraud and Carlos' Con & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 10
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 10 This episode includes: Cyril Wecht, Psychic Family Roots, Search for Kristi and Baby Brother Lost & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 21
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 21 This episode includes: Li'l Miss & UD, Lost Dutchman's Mine Pts. 1 & 2 and Kiss of Death.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 2
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 2 This episode includes: Badlands & UD, Sixty Miles, McFall and Mail Call & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 22
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 28 This episode includes: Boston Strangler (Pts. 1 & 2) & UD, Secret Hiding Place & UD and Wrong Place, Wrong Time.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 9
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 9 This episode includes: Bomb Throwing Fugitive (Pts. 1 & 2) & UD, UD: Social Security Murder, Mona Lisa, Is Doreen Dead? and Gone Fishing & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 11
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 This episode includes: Fool's Gold, Update: Baltimore Babynapping, Suicide Homicide, Baby Broker and Donald Eugene Webb.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 14
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 14 This episode includes: Larry's Last Race & UD, UD: Til Death Do Us Part, Millionairess Murder & UD and Dances With Moomess & UD.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack - Episode: 22
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 22 This episode includes: Pizza Man & UD, The Dale & UD, Update: Mrs. Millionaire and Teri's Killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 20 Police run down more than 11,000 leads before coming up with a suspect in the murders of three Virginia girls, and the abduction and strangulation of a California woman continue to baffle the investigators more than 11 years after the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 2 The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 5 A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 4 Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 11 Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 22 The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 10 A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger - MST3K: Gamera vs. Jiger
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch Gamera save the day at Osaka's Expo '70, in GAMERA VS JIGER (1970). Pearl tries to convince Kinga to take a break.

programme.title: MST3K: Gamera Vs. Zigra - MST3K: Gamera Vs. Zigra
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The seventh offering from Gamera: the infamous turtle faces off against an alien called Zigra determined on world domination. Joel and the Bots build a scale model of Gamera and make shoebox dioramas.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: Out Of This World
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 22 It's Heaven vs. Hell in this short. Plus: bread?

programme.title: MST3K: The Brain That Wouldn't Die - MST3K: The Brain That Wouldn't Die
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 New guy Mike Nelson finishes his training and makes his way into the theater. His first outing is the movie The Brain That Wouldn't Die

programme.title: MST3K: The Crawling Hand - MST3K: The Crawling Hand
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel and the Bots have a tough time agreeing on how to spend their free time between segments of the teen sci-fi thriller "The Crawling Hand".

programme.title: MST3K: The Creeping Terror - MST3K: The Creeping Terror
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Mike and the 'bots watch The Creeping Terror (1964), with its infamous walking-carpet monster, and parody Love, American Style (1969).

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K - Backlot: MST3K Turkey Day!
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 21 A compilation of new introductions for the infamous Turkey Day marathon as well as a nostalgic look back on the Comedy Central fan-favorite marathon of Mystery Science Theater.

programme.title: MST3K: Master Ninja I - MST3K: Master Ninja I
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The crew watch a ninja and a drifter save an airport from thugs in "Master Ninja I" while building a model muscle car and experimenting with their ninja skills.

programme.title: MST3K: Master Ninja II - MST3K: Master Ninja II
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel and the 'bots endure two equally bad episodes from the failed action seriesThe Master(1984).

programme.title: Good Witch - Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 3 Hallmark Original Series. Trouble is brewing after Cassie's mystery guest Ashley goes missing.

programme.title: Good Witch - All in the Family
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 4 Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's mischievous cousin Abigail is back in Middleton.

programme.title: Silver Bells - Silver Bells
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Anne Heche and Tate Donovan star in an adaptation of Luanne Rice's Christmas tale about a widower who finds love in New York City. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: A Dog Named Christmas - A Dog Named Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A developmentally-challenged young man is determined to prove to his family that he can care for a dog on his own. In his triumph, he inspires his father to love the new member of the family. Stars Bruce Greenwood, Linda Emond.

programme.title: Hitched for the Holidays - Hitched for the Holidays
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Movie. Both Rob Marino and Julie Green are feeling pressure to be in a relationship.

programme.title: Good Witch - The Truth About Lies
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 5 Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's magic can't keep her away from Abigail's scheming.

programme.title: Good Witch - The Storm
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 6 Hallmark Original Series. A blizzard threatens disaster in Middleton.

programme.title: Good Witch - Together We Stand...
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 7 Hallmark Original Series. The winter storm continues to pose a threat to all of Middleton.

programme.title: Good Witch - Second Time Around
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 1 Hallmark Original Series. Sam's ex-wife Linda threatens to come between them.

programme.title: Good Witch - Driven
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 2 Hallmark Original Series. The arrival of a man from Cassie's past may complicate her relationship.

programme.title: Good Witch - Out of the Past
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's old friend John attempts to unearth their shared college memories.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Descent
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 3 The SG-1 team investigates an abandoned Goa'uld ship orbiting the Earth. While they try to salvage the ship, saboteurs attack and the vessel plummets to Earth, deep into the ocean, with O'Neill and his crew trapped inside…and time running out.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Frozen
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 4 An alien that might predate human evolution by 50 million years is discovered in Antarctica and may be part of the race that invented the Stargate. After SG-1 manages to thaw her back to life, they discover she may be the source of a deadly virus.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Nightwalkers
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 5 When a scientist working on stem cell research disappears, Carter, Teal'c and Quinn investigate and discover that the scientist's town is infested with Goa'uld who can only control the citizens by night. Will Carter, Teal'c and Quinn be taken over?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Abyss
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 6 A Goa'uld lord holds O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) captive and tortures him for information about the Tok'ra. As O'Neill suffers, Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) appears and offers support. Meanwhile, SG-1 races to O'Neill before it's too late.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Shadow Play
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 7 Quinn is conflicted when a professor from his home planet asks SG-1 to help stage a coup against the Kelownan government in order to stop a civil war. Should SG-1 allow the planet to destroy itself…or are they placing themselves in needless danger?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Other Guys
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 8 Two scientists working on an off-world research project witness SG-1 captured in a Goa'uld raid and attempt to rescue them. Little do they know that SG-1 staged the capture in order to infiltrate the Goa'uld and make contact with a Tok'ra informant.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Allegiance
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 9 The Tok'ra must take refuge from the Goa'uld at the SGC Alpha Site occupied by Jaffa. Bad blood between the races begins to boil as an assassin wreaks havoc on the camp. Can O'Neill stop the bloodshed before the assassin escapes with coordinates?

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Cure
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 10 SG-1 visits Pangar, a planet inhabited by humans who have developed a drug that makes their immune systems perfect. Unknown to SG-1 is the means by which the drug is produced, a startling discovery that may hold the key to the origins of the Tok'ra!

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Tracker
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 9 McKay and Ronan volunteer to assist Dr. Jennifer Keller with a medical follow-up away from Atlantis. Later, when the pair return to her, they are surprised to learn that she left earlier but a search of the village turns up no sign of her.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - First Contact
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 10 Stargate SG-1’s Dr. Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) travels to Atlantis when his research suggests that a rebellious Ancient scientist named Janus (Gildart Jackson) may have hidden a secret lab somewhere within the city.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Lost Tribe
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 11 Jackson and McKay have reactivated the Attero device, an ancient machine designed to annihilate the Wraith. In doing so, they discover the reason the device was ultimately abandoned… Meanwhile, Todd continues to hold the Daedalus crew captive.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Outsiders
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 12 Col. Sheppard and his team locate Dr. Carson Beckett on an alien planet where he is treating a small group of survivors of the Hoffan plague. But that same evening, a party of Wraith warriors arrives, threatening total annihilation.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Inquisition
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 13 A newly formed galactic coalition extends an invitation to Lt. Col. John Sheppard and his team to represent Atlantis at their next meeting. But on arrival, the team is immediately detained and must stand trial for crimes against humanity.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Prodigal
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 14 Atlantis is suddenly plunged into darkness, with only the top tier of the central tower unaffected. As Sheppard and McKay attempt to get to the top level, they discover that a force field has been established to prevent them from gaining access.
